api.errorMessage: An error occured. Please try again later

wrongLoginMethod.description: It seems like you have registered to the service using another login method. Please log out of the service and try a different login method.
wrongLoginMethod.title: Oops!

deviceTimeError.message: Believe it or not, but we can’t allow you to log in because the clock on your device is off by more than five minutes. Please set the time and try again.
deviceTimeError.shortMessage: Log in error. Check your device time and try again.

authentication.errorMessage: An error occured while logging in. Please try again

loadUserError.message: An error occurred. Please try logging in again.

networkError.message: Login error: Check your network connection or try again later

permRequestDenied.message: You need to approve our request to access your Tunnistamo profile in order to use this service. Please try logging in again.

expired.label: Session expired
expired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

message.eventVisitsThisYear: Events you have registered this year

warning.text: Are you sure you want to leave the site? You will lose all unsaved data.

goToProfile.buttonText: Go to your Culture Kid profile

message.serviceDescription: We are delighted that you are involved in Culture Kids! Here you can view event invitations and register for events. All Culture Kids are welcome to attend two events per year, one event in the spring and one in the autumn. Sometimes there may be more events available, in which case we will announce it separately. We are looking forward to seeing you!

addChildMutation.errorMessage: Error adding child. Please try again.

availableEvent.readMoreAndEnrolButton: Read more and register for event

prompt.heading: Are you sure you want to delete the child's information?
prompt.text: By removing the child's information you will stop receiving invites to events.

childNotes.heading: My diary of events
childNotes.noNotes: Attach information about past Culture Kids events here and write notes about future ones as well.
childNotes.errorMessage: An error occurred while saving the data. Please try again later.

message.allSignupsSpent: Congratulations! You have already attended two events this year. See you next year!
message.enrollToEvent: You have a valid invitation to events. Sign up!
message.youAreEnrolled: You are registered for the event.

noupcomingevents.text: Event invitations sent to you will be displayed here. You can sign up for events and cancel your attendance if you, for some reason, are unable to attend.

email.title: Welcome to the Culture Kids programme!

description.full: Unfortunately this event is full. Subscribe to receive a notification of available places.
description.text: Check that the information below is correct for the event you wish to attend.

error.capacityHasChanged: The available capacity of the event has changed. Please refresh your browser.
error.childAlreadyJoined: This child has already been enrolled in this event.

notificationSubscriptionModal.description: You will receive a notification via email when places become available for the event {{eventName}} {{date}} at {{time}}. Available places are given to those who first register for them.
notificationSubscriptionModal.title: Subscribe to receive a notification of available places

successToast.heading: Registration for event successful
successToast.paragraph: We sent you a confirmation message by email where you can find more information about the event

message.cantEnrollNotice: Please note, that you cannot register for this event.

confirmationModal.heading: Are you sure you want to cancel your participation?

cancellation.heading: Cancellation of registration
cancellation.paragraph: Please remember to cancel your participation in case you are not able to attend the event so that another child is able to take your place. Thank you!

participantsPerInviteEnumLong.CHILD_AND_1_OR_2_GUARDIANS: One or two adults can accompany a child in this registration
participantsPerInviteEnumLong.CHILD_AND_GUARDIAN: One adult can accompany a child in this registration
participantsPerInviteEnumLong.FAMILY: The whole faily is welcome to this event with this registration

eventRedirectPage.continue: Yes, I want to receive my password!
eventRedirectPage.description: Registration for this event takes place on external ticket service (Ticketmaster, Lippupiste or Tixly) outside the Culture Kids service. There you can create a free-of-charge account, if you do not already have one. You can browse all the available events and register for any of them, as long as there are still places available.
eventRedirectPage.passwordAcquireDescription: In the next phase, you will receive a personal password that will allow you to book tickets on external ticket service. Please note that these events are only available by using the link below.
eventRedirectPage.passwordCopyDescription: Copy the password and then continue to the external ticket system service (Ticketmaster, Lippupiste or Tixly).
eventRedirectPage.title: Register for an event
eventRedirectPage.noFreeTicketSystemPasswordsLeftLabel: Unfortunately there are no more passwords left
eventRedirectPage.noFreeTicketSystemPasswordsErrorDescript:
Unfortunately this event's passwords have already run out.

Please go back and choose another event.

giveFeedback.label: Give feedback of the Culture Kids service

service.name: The Culture Kids service
service.text: Contact us to find out more about the service.

home.coronaNotice: All events have been cancelled for the time being, due to the coronavirus. But please don’t let that stop you from joining Culture Kids! We will share more information with everyone who has registered when events can once again be held safely.

heading.text: How can I take part in the activities?

kid.text: If the child lives in Helsinki and was born in or after 2020, you may sign them up to become a Culture Kid and register with the service.

theater.text: You can have fun experiencing culture with your child. The events are designed to support your child’s development and well-being.

ticket.text: You will receive an invitation via e-mail two times a year, and you can use the service to sign up for your preferred events.

description.text: Download more information about Culture Kids -service in your own language.

heading.text: Information about the service on different languages

partner.dot: The Association of Drama and Theatre
partner.kulttuuriperintokasvatus: The Association of Cultural Heritage Education in Finland

registration.text: Start by entering the hometown and year of birth of the child you want to register. After this you will be able to log in to the service and complete your child’s Culture Kid profile. This should only take a few minutes.

hero.descriptionText: All children born in Helsinki in and after 2020 are invited to become Culture Kids. The kids are invited to two events each year until they start school. These events are free of charge.
hero.heading: Culture Kids

underConstruction.heading: Signing up begins January 31, 2020
underConstruction.text: Welcome to the Culture Kids programme! Unfortunately the sign up has not yet been open. You can sign up your child starting January 31st 2020.

checkbox.label: I assure that the information I have provided is correct

notFound.text: The page you are looking for couldn't be found

message.noEnrollEvent_other: You are registered for the event.
message.noEnrollEventGroup_one: Please note that you are already registered for one event.
message.noEnrollEventGroup_other: Please note that you are already registered for one event.

hero.header: Welcome to the Culture Kids programme!

externalTicketSystemEvent.continueButton: Continue to the external ticket system service
externalTicketSystemEvent.description: If you have not booked your tickets yet, please do so as soon as possible.
externalTicketSystemEvent.extraInfo: If you do not want to book places now, you will find your password for later use under your child’s future events.

date.unSupported: The year of birth is unsupported and cannot be in future

main.text: This website uses essential cookies to ensure the basic functionality and performance of the site. In addition, we use targeting cookies to improve the user experience, perform analytics and display personalised content.

required.title: Necessary cookies
required.text: Necessary cookies cannot be rejected. They enable the proper functioning of the website and affect the usability.

essential.title: Cookies related to basic functionalities
essential.text: Cookies related to basic functionalities cannot be rejected. They enable the proper functioning of the website and affect the usability.

matomo.title: Matomo
matomo.text: Matomo Analytics software is being used to follow and improve the website to better attend to user's needs.
matomo.expandAriaLabel: Show cookie information related to the Matomo.

cookies.matomo: A cookie of the Matomo statistics system
cookies.linkedevents: A cookie to authorise the retrieval of events
cookies.i18next: A cookie to remember the website language selection
cookies.wordpress: A cookie for operation of the WordPress-content management system.

expiration.session: The session cookie is deleted once the user exits the page
